document_data.name: The Marking
document_data.mainbody: The '''Marking''' was a ceremony held by worshipers of [[Beshaba]] when they ascended in rank within the clergy.
document_data.Activities: The Marking involved a permanent marking of the [[cleric]] with a tattoo or brand. This was accompanied by drum music and dancing over a fire. The marked priest needed to endure the pain and discomfort of the ceremony without any kind of healing or other aid.
